snippet.title: Classic Sonic Improvement Mod - Trailer (Sonic Generations)
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD: https://gamebanana.com/mods/50761
Discord Group: https://discord.gg/EqJWWAP
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShowinGrowin

Trailer Credits:
Showin - Animation, Backgrounds, Etc
Mikester - Trailer Editor
Duck Dealer - Backgrounds
Hyper Potions - Music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZTZrhN420t4

A bit of a disclaimer. This trailer was far into production when certain allegations came out against one of the musicians of Hyper Potions. This song would not had been used if this was known sooner. (It was literally days before release.)

As you can see from how much the trailer is synced to the song (with little animated bits specifically made for it) it would be rather difficult to actually change at that stage. I asked the community what would be the best course of action and they pretty much agreed that releasing it as originally intended was the best option.

Here's more info about the situation: https://twitter.com/ShowinGrowin/status/1637407322472427525
